Duilin: titles=Lord of the [[House of the Swallow]]

{{disambig-more: '''Duilin''' was an [[Elf]]-lord of [[Gondolin]], chief of the [[House of the Swallow]], as is stated in the [[Fall of Gondolin]].  He was a master archer, as well as the "swiftest of all men to run and leap".  He perished during the Fall upon the walls even as he shot, smitten by a fiery bolt of the [[Balrogs]].<ref>{{LT2
His name means "(spring-singer), swallow" in [[Gnomish]]; its [[Qenya]] form is ''Tuilindo''.<ref>{{PE
